title: Patch 5.5 very slow
body:
Hey guys!

So I've tried patching 5.5 yesterday and so many issues occured (one of them **stuck at 33% issue**) and they have been resolved. But now my patch is really slow running 50-70kbps and now im at 34%. Someone please help me.

Thanks
Jollyphilip12

replies.body:
Have you

ugh... I've said this three times already so time to copy paste:

Have you tried disconnected and reconnecting your internet while it's frozen at 33% Sometimes just refreshing the connection will make it work.

Really? this is one of the fastest patches I've had in ages.... dunno why tho, supposed to be really big. But the loading for games and the server lag is awesome now, don't dc every 3 sec because of server failing me and the loading is like 2 min now. Im loving it... until the randoms ruin your game, crying about how they cant fight someone they counter (**cough** **cough** yas cant w properly **cough** not my fault **cough**)
